channel.title: Quotes on Beards, Bytes and Brews
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on Beards, Bytes and Brews

item.title: Swami_Sivananda
item.description: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.

item.title: Epictetus 20190320
item.description: Itâ€™s not what happens to you, but how you react to it that matters.
We build our computer (systems) the way we build our cities: over time, without a plan, on top of ruins.

item.title: thomasfuchs-20180906
item.description: As a programmer, never underestimate your ability to come up with ridiculously complex solutions for simple problems.

item.title: fortunecookie-20180828
item.description: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
No man knows how bad he is till he has tried very hard to be good.
